definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Distinguished the definition of kaolin from that of kaolinite .
sentences.chinese: 从研究的角度对高岭土和高岭石的概念进行了区分。

sentences.english: The Longyan kaolin deposit in Fujian province, is of weathering residual type of altered granite.
sentences.chinese: 福建龙岩高岭土矿床是蚀变花岗岩风化残余型矿床。

sentences.english: So, the activity of metakaolin is the highest after calcined at 700℃.
sentences.chinese: 因此，700℃下煅烧得到的偏高岭土活性最高。

sentences.english: The existing forms of iron and titanium in kaolin have a great effect on the whiteness of kaolin.
sentences.chinese: 高岭土中铁和钛存在的形式对其白度具有重要影响。

sentences.english: There is a large reserves of metakaolin in china, which is widely used in various industries.
sentences.chinese: 我国高岭土储量很大，目前被广泛应用于各种行业中。

sentences.english: The setting and hardening characteristics of alkali-activated metakaolin cementitious materials were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 对碱偏高岭土胶凝材料的凝结硬化性能进行了研究。

sentences.english: The processing techniques of coal series kaolinite are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了煤系高岭土的几种深加工利用方法。

sentences.english: The supply source of silicon power is rare, but it may be re-placed with super-fine kaolin clay.
sentences.chinese: 硅粉货源有限，可用高活性偏高岭土超细粉代替。

sentences.english: Discoloring impurities lowers the brightness of kaolin and limits its use.
sentences.chinese: 致色杂质降低了高岭土的亮度并限制了它的应用范围。

sentences.english: A novel preparation method for amorphous silica from coal-based kaolin was developed.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了以煤系高岭土为原料制备白炭黑的新方法。

sentences.english: The characteristics of the technological mineralogy of kaolin directly decide its industrial utilization.
sentences.chinese: 高岭土的工艺矿物学特征直接决定着它的工业用途。

sentences.english: This article introduces a method used for preparing a highly-effective composite flocculant by use of kaoline as raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种用高岭土制备高效复合絮凝剂的方法。

sentences.english: The production process and its application in latex paint of this calcinated kaolin clay were described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了该煅烧高岭土的生产工序及其在乳胶漆的应用。

sentences.english: Ceramic body for fan wei feldspar, quartz, gaol in, etc.
sentences.chinese: 陶瓷坯体用原料主要有长石，石英，高岭土等。

sentences.english: Kaolin and other kaolinic clays, whether or not calcined.
sentences.chinese: 高岭土及类似土，不论是否煅烧。

sentences.english: The SEM images validate that modified titanium oxide was deposited on the surface of kaolinite.
sentences.chinese: SEM照片证实了改性氧化钛包覆于高岭土上。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
